languages.text: {n}Несмотря на пугающий объем информации, из лекции удается почерпнуть немало интересного об истории династии, хотели вы того или нет.{/n}
{n}Abelard provides you with a daunting amount of information, but you still learn quite a lot about your dynastic history... whether you want to or not.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Несмотря на пугающий объем информации, из лекции удается почерпнуть немало интересного об истории династии, хотели вы того или нет.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In spite of the daunting volume of information, you manage to glean much of interest about your dynastic history whether your intended to or not.{/n}
{n}In spite of the daunting volume of information, you manage to glean much of interest about your dynastic history whether your intended to or not.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dans ce déluge d'informations, vous parvenez tout de même à apprendre beaucoup de choses sur l'histoire de votre dynastie... bon gré, mal gré.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard provides you with a daunting amount of information, but you still learn quite a lot about your dynastic history... whether you want to or not.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dans ce déluge d'informations, vous parvenez tout de même à apprendre beaucoup de choses sur l'histoire de votre dynastie... bon gré, mal gré.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard te proporciona una cantidad abrumadora de información, pero aprendes mucho sobre la historia de tu dinastía... quieras o no.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard provides you with a daunting amount of information, but you still learn quite a lot about your dynastic history... whether you want to or not.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard te proporciona una cantidad abrumadora de información, pero aprendes mucho sobre la historia de tu dinastía... quieras o no.{/n}

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德的解说充斥着令人望而生畏的巨额信息，但即便如此，你还是学到了很多关于冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的历史知识……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard provides you with a daunting amount of information, but you still learn quite a lot about your dynastic history... whether you want to or not.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德的解说充斥着令人望而生畏的巨额信息，但即便如此，你还是学到了很多关于冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的历史知识……{/n}

languages.text: {n}アベラルドが提供する情報は膨大だが、それでも王朝の歴史についてかなり多くのことを学ぶことになる…望まないにしても。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard provides you with a daunting amount of information, but you still learn quite a lot about your dynastic history... whether you want to or not.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドが提供する情報は膨大だが、それでも王朝の歴史についてかなり多くのことを学ぶことになる…望まないにしても。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard stellt dir eine ungeheure Fülle von Informationen zur Verfügung, die dich fast erschlägt, aber du erfährst viel über die Geschichte deiner Dynastie ... ob du willst oder nicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard provides you with a daunting amount of information, but you still learn quite a lot about your dynastic history... whether you want to or not.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard stellt dir eine ungeheure Fülle von Informationen zur Verfügung, die dich fast erschlägt, aber du erfährst viel über die Geschichte deiner Dynastie ... ob du willst oder nicht.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard sana boğucu miktarda bilgi aktarıyor ama hanedanlık tarihiyle ilgili bayağı bir şey öğreniyorsun... İstesen de istemesen de.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard provides you with a daunting amount of information, but you still learn quite a lot about your dynastic history... whether you want to or not.{/n}
